posts.post_content: Offered for sale is an 1896 Whitehead and Hoag Sporting Life Pin. The front displays Uncle Sam showing Sporting Life for sale for 5 cents. It also says on the perimeter Baseball Guns Cycling. The back still has the paper showing the maker as Whitehead and Hoag with 3 patent dates from 1894-1896. Asking 125.00 delivered.
I would go $65.00 if interested.  Thanks,chris
